blocks.description: A seasoned Full Stack Developer with over 15 years of experience in developing high-performance, secure web applications and systems.

blocks.body:
# What I Do Best

I build secure, scalable applications, with experience in critical systems for companies like **BNP Paribas Fortis** and my own projects like **DinnerGift**. I focus on **performance**, **security**, and **reliability**. Let's connect to discuss how I can help bring your project to life.

blocks.title: Why Clients Love Working with Me

items.title: Security-First Approach
items.text: I prioritize security at every stage of development, ensuring your application is resilient against modern threats with expertise in applying OWASP standards.

items.title: Quality-Driven
items.text: I aim for the highest quality in every project, ensuring the solutions I deliver are functional, secure, reliable, and maintainable.

items.title: Effective Communication
items.text: My clients appreciate my clear and transparent communication, helping them understand their needs and keeping them informed throughout the project.

items.title: Motivated and Positive
items.text: I bring a positive attitude and sense of humor, making collaboration enjoyable while staying focused on results.

items.title: Independent and Reliable
items.text: With experience in developing, deploying, and securing my own projects, I work independently, manage tasks efficiently, and meet deadlines.

items.title: Problem Solver
items.text: I thrive on tackling complex challenges, whether securing an application or solving tricky development issues, ensuring the job gets done effectively.

items.title: Senior Full Stack Developer at BNP Paribas Fortis
items.text: Led the development of a high-performance document and statement archiving system, handling billions of records, while integrating security measures aligned with OWASP standards.

items.title: Owner and Developer of DinnerGift
items.text: Created a platform connecting restaurants and customers for selling and buying gift certificates, using modern web technologies and a security-first mindset.

items.title: Technical Lead for BNP Paribas Fortis' E-commerce Project
items.text: Managed the Enablement project responsible for user onboarding to the financial platform Centric, ensuring all features met stringent security requirements.

items.title: Programming Languages
items.text: Java, JavaScript (ES6), Typescript, PHP, C, C++, HTML, CSS, SASS

items.title: Frameworks and Libraries
items.text: Spring Boot, Spring Core, React, Redux, Angular, AngularJS, NextJs, Express.js

items.title: Security Practices
items.text: OWASP Top 10, Secure Coding, Vulnerability Management

items.title: Development Tools
items.text: IntelliJ, Visual Studio Code, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, GIT, Maven, GitHub Actions, CircleCI

items.title: Methodologies
items.text: Agile (Scrum, KANBAN), Test-Driven Development (TDD), Behavior-Driven Development (BDD)

items.title: Testing and Security Tools
items.text: Cypress, Cucumber, Mocha, Chai, JUnit, Mockito, Automated Security Scanning
